Matsushima Central Park (Korean: 송도중앙공원 / Matsushima Central Park, English: Songdo Central Park) is a large public park located in the Matsushima International City, Incheon, Republic of Korea, with concepts from New York Central Park. Central Park covers 101 acres and occupies about 10 [%] of the Matsushima International City.
